title: Cant load or download game/Pvp Patcher Kernel
body:
Hello everyone!


     I have been playing this game for like 5 years now and have never had this problem!! I tryed this morning loading the game and PVP.net Patcher Kernal has stoped working. So i figure i got time to kill lets delete the entire game and reinstall....Same issue..Please help!

replies.body: OK, so I ran game as administrator and launch came up, then closed the client and opened game normally and that worked too. Not sure if the administrative privileges fixed it or riot did some fixes on their end, but games up and running again :).

I'm having the same problem.

Yesterday I was able to launch the client and play normally, but this morning the moment I click the launcher client I get the error message that the PvP Patcher Kernal has stopped working and can only close program. Yesterday when I was logged in though I did see a global message that riot is aware of people unable to connect to client. Is this an issue on riots end or will we have to re-install the whole game after they do a fix?

If you are specifically getting the Patcher Kernel error, this is usually caused by some sort of weird OS Permissions Issues.  Essentially, the patcher is trying to launch itself, but the OS is blocking it from doing so.  Make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104), which should get this resolved completely.

Give me a heads up if you are still experiencing these issues!
I can't access the patcher without it crashing and giving me a RADS error.
I am getting the same thing.
